name: Zombie Party (itch) (SnakeBite Studio)
description:
Zombie Party is a game that I developed with some friends that I met at the Global Game Jam 2018! I ported the game to get playable at browser. Here is the original submit at the Global Game Jam website. Global Game Jam Link

Brian is a dancing zombie that is alone in the world. His purpose is transmit good feelings while dancing and makes some new friends!... But some bad boys want to ruin his party. Join the party and transmit good feelings around the world. 

Controls: 

Move Controls - WASD 

Press SPACE Key with rhythm near people to earn points and "convince" their to join the party.
